DialogLine.Default: It is too soon for that kind of treaty.

DialogLine.Friendly: We are the Borg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own. Resistance is futile.
DialogLine.Neutral: We are the Borg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own. Resistance is futile.
DialogLine.Hostile: We are the Borg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own. Resistance is futile.

DialogLine.Friendly: Organic activity has been detected in Borg systems. Intent analysis under way. Probability of armed conflict: increasing.
DialogLine.Neutral: Organic activity has been detected in Borg systems. Intent analysis under way. Probability of armed conflict: moderate.
DialogLine.Hostile: Organic activity has been detected in Borg systems. Intent analysis suggests probability of armed conflict is high.

DialogLine.Friendly: SING ships have destroyed Borg vessels. Intent analysis suggests SING error pending further aggression.
DialogLine.Neutral: SING ships have destroyed Borg vessels. Intent analysis suggests SING aggression. Awaiting further inputs.
DialogLine.Hostile: SING ships have destroyed Borg vessels. Intent analysis suggests hostile SING aggression. Preparing for armed conflict pending further inputs.

DialogLine.Friendly: SING ships detected in Borg space. Analysis of Borg / SING relations suggests non-aggressive force movements. Further analysis required.
DialogLine.Neutral: SING ships detected in Borg space. Analysis of Borg / SING relations suggests moderate probability of aggression. Situation flagged for monitoring.
DialogLine.Hostile: SING ships detected in Borg space. Analysis of Borg / SING relations suggests imminent aggressive action. Preparing armed response.

DialogLine.Friendly: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.
DialogLine.Neutral: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.
DialogLine.Hostile: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.

DialogLine.Friendly: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.
DialogLine.Neutral: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.
DialogLine.Hostile: SING expansion into Borg space suggests PLURAL do not value Borg relations. Adjusting diplomatic routines appropriately.

Dialogs.DialogLine: Declare War We are the Borg. Lower your shields and surrender your ships. We will add your biological and technological distinctiveness to our own. Your culture will adapt to service us. Resistance is futile. We are the Borg. Resistance as you know it is over. We will add your biological and technological distinctiveness to our own.>

DialogLine.Default: Insufficient data. No other spacefaring races encountered.

DialogLine.Friendly: Engaging diplomatic routines. Case: Friendly. Non-threatening greeting tendered.
DialogLine.Neutral: Engaging diplomatic routines. Case: Neutral. Respectful greeting offered.
DialogLine.Hostile: Negotiation is irrelevant. You will be assimilated.

DialogLine.Default: Are there no Borg who are individuals who are free to act as they choose?
Freedom is irrelevant. Self-determination is irrelevant.

DialogLine.DL_Ruth: We seek perfection through assimilation. We will add your biological and technological distinctiveness to our own.

DialogLine.Default: Insufficient data points indicating SING trustworthiness. Unwilling to aid potential adversary.
Insufficient trust data points counter-balanced by profitable arrangement. Risk-reward analysis: accept offer.
Insufficient trust data points. Borg contributions much greater than SING contributions. Offer rejected.
Trust data points: sufficient. Unacceptable loss of profit. Offer rejected.
Unacceptable input-output ratio. Flag diplomatic routines to increase hostility with PLURAL.
Input-output ratios acceptable. Offer accepted.
Favorable input-output ratios. Offer accepted.
Favorable input-output ratios. Possible trading error detected. Taking advantage of error. Offer accepted.
Input to output ratio infinite. "Gift" concept detected. Adjusting diplomatic algorithms to reflect increased relations with PLURAL.
PLURAL request aid. Request granted.
Aggressive diplomatic demand detected. SING military forces insufficient to support threats. Demand rejected.
Aggressive tone detected. Input-output ratios acceptable. Aggressive tone unnecessary. Offer accepted.
Aggressive tone detected. Input-output ratio unfavourable. Military analysis suggests SING fleet more powerful than Borg fleet. Offer accepted.
Initiate hostile relations with PLURAL. Flag diplomatic algorithms to remove trust data points as result of breached non-aggression treaty. Tactical vessels have been dispatched.
Hostile relations initiated. Strength if irrelevant. Resistant is futile.
Negotiation is irrelevant. You will be assimilated.
SING aggression exceeds allowable thresholds. Hostile relations initiated. Tactical vessels have been dispatched.
SING expansion into Borg space exceeds allowable thresholds. Hostile relations initiated. Tactical vessels have been dispatched.
SING expansion into TARSYS exceeds allowable thresholds. Hostile relations initiated. Tactical vessels have been dispatched.
Diplomatic analysis suggests a mutual pledge of non-aggression would result in favourable relation increases. Inputs?
Relations increase acknowledged.
Diplomatic algorithms adjusted appropriately.
Economic analysis suggests importation of SING goods would increase Borg efficiency. Trade treaty offered. Inputs?
Trade treaty acknowledged.
Rejection acknowledged.
Previous SING outputs rejected a non-aggression pact.
Previous SING outputs rejected a trade treaty.
Give Borg TECH_DEMAND.
Diplomatic relations increased.
Diplomatic relations decreased.
Military analysis of SING fleets suggest critical weakness. Probability of targeting PLURAL for assimilation increasing.
Military analysis of SING fleets suggest strength. Probability of targeting PLURAL for assimilation decreasing.
Military analysis of SING fleets revised. Current fleet strength requires re-targeting of assimilation priorities.
Borg worlds becoming mineral depleted. Analysis of SING fleets suggest weakness. Tactical vessels have been dispatched. Resistance is futile.
Collective outnumbers Dominion. They will be assimilated.
Collective outnumbers Dominion. They will be assimilated.
Collective outnumbers Dominion. They will be assimilated.
They have resisted us long enough. They will become one with the Borg.
They have resisted us long enough. They will become one with the Borg.
They have resisted us long enough. They will become one with the Borg.
Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Honor is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
Honor is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
Honor is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
Cunning is irrelevant. Their resistance to us is futile.
Cunning is irrelevant. Their resistance to us is futile.
Cunning is irrelevant. Their resistance to us is futile.
Logic is irrelevant. Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Logic is irrelevant. Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Logic is irrelevant. Their biological and technological distinctiveness will be added to our own.
Strength is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
Strength is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
Strength is irrelevant. They will be assimilated.
All diplomatic treaties cancelled. Hostile relations initiated. Borg need of SING worlds priority one. Resistance is futile.
Assimilation successful. Welcome to the Collective.
Diplomatic analysis suggests appropriate course is to open borders between Borg and PLURAL. Inputs?
Borg vessels will now accept SING passage.
Acknowledged.
Unexpected change in relationship. Adjusting diplomatic routines. Initiating hostile relations.
Planetary invasion detected. Unexpected inputs. Initiating hostile relations. Tactical vessels have been dispatched.

DialogLine.Friendly: SING activity detected in TARSYS system. SING presence counter-productive to Borg imperatives. Cessation of SING colonization activity in TARSYS system required for continued delay of assimilation
DialogLine.Neutral: SING activity detected in TARSYS system. SING presence counter-productive to Borg imperatives. Imminent assimilation unless SING colonization activity ceases.
DialogLine.Hostile: SING activity detected in TARSYS system. SING presence counter-productive to Borg imperatives. Probability of hostile activity if SING colonization activities continue: high.

DialogLine.Default: Identified SING colony in TARSYS system. Diplomatic relations damaged. Analysing possible military consequences.
Insufficient data. Diplomatic posture: neutral.
Diplomatic analysis suggests continued peaceful interactions until assimilation is appropriate.
Begin recitation of diplomatic grievances.
Problem Zero: SING colonization of Borg interests.
Zero: SING colonization of Borg interests.
One: SING fleet strength exceeds Borg fleet strength.
One: SING fleet strength meets requirements for Borg assimilation.
Zero: SING military strength insufficient to withstand Borg assault. Increases Borg assimilation potential.
Zero: SING fleet strength exceeds Borg fleet strength.
Zero: PLURAL alliance with TAREMP threatens Borg interests.
Addendum: PLURAL alliance with TAREMP threatens Borg interests.
All diplomatic systems nominal.
Borg military analysis concludes SING defeat probable. Assimilation imminent.
Borg interests threatened by SING military strength. Assimilation delayed.
Borg requests SING assistance in war against TAREMP. Diplomatic benefits will result in delay of assimilation.
Input acknowledged. Adjusting diplomatic relations appropriately.
Input acknowledged. Adjusting diplomatic relations appropriately.
Borg request cessation of hostilities.
Borg request cessation of hostilities.
Borg request cessation of hostilities.
Borg request cessation of hostilities.
Borg request cessation of hostilities.
Borg cede contested claims and requests cessation of hostilities.
Acknowledged.
Acknowledged. Borg vessels re-purposing to non-hostile activities.
Diplomatic offer accepted. Assimilation has been delayed.
Insufficient gain for Borg.
Borg assimilation imperatives exceed peace benefits.
Assimilation has been delayed, for now.
Borg do not have emotions.
Diplomatic and military subroutines suggest optimization of Borg efforts through alliance with PLURAL. Inputs?
Alliance acknowledged. Borg pledge a delay of assimilation to PLURAL.
Inputs received. PLURAL unwilling to enter alliance.
Inputs too complicated to consider alliance. Reformulate offer.
Alliance engaged. Assimilation delayed.
No alliance. Assimilation accelerated.
You must be assimilated. Tactical vessels will intensify attacks.
...processing...war has not been initialized. Assimilation will be delayed.
Unexpected result. Allies do not refuse allies in times of war. Alliance nullified. Assimilation priorities reconfigured.
Error. Expected Borg consumption of TARSYS. SING consumption observed. Remedy: Abort, Retry, Delete PLURAL. Analysing.
SING Virus identified in TARSYS system. Assimilation probable.
Network security breach detected. We know it was you.
Error. Network security breached again. Increase diplomatic pressure.
Error! Critical network security flaw detected. Assimilation required! (Treaties Cancelled)
Network infiltrator eliminated. Organic killed.
Error: Allies should not spy on one another. Cease immediately.
Error: Infiltrator detected. End Alliance Process effective immediately.
Initiate Open Borders Treaty?
Negative input received.
Negative
Negative
Negative. Alliance too fresh.
Negative. Borg are superior.
Full System Integration? ...Your individuality added to our own? It is agreed. We shall merge and create something superior.
Borg will integrate systems with PLURAL. First, PLURAL must eliminate TAREMP.
Stated Conditions for Federation have been met with the elimination of TAREMP. We will now integrate.
Negative.
Anticipate error: your enemy is our friend. Condition: make alliance with TAREMP. Result: Federation merger approval.
Condition detected: Alliance. Full system integration approved. Borg will join your Federation.
Negative. You are not at war with TAREMP. Borg see no incentive.
Borg already are at war with TAREMP.
Borg agree. War declared.
Negative. Borg interests are contrary to the request.
Negative. Borg relations with PLURAL insufficient.
Borg is...pacifist? Error! Error!
Negative. The threat is too severe.
Affirmative. Target acquired for assimilation.
